sentences: Shamshi Kaldayakov (Kazakh: Шәмші Қалдаяқов, Şämşı Qaldaiaqov; 15 August 1937 in Temirlanovka, South Kazakhstan Province – 29 February 1992 in Almaty) was a Kazakh composer.
It was adopted in 2006 to be the Kazakhstan national anthem by Kazakh President Nursultan Nazarbayev after a few modifications in the lyrics.
